text: Tony Maudsley (born 30 January 1968) is an English actor. He is best known for portraying the role of Kenneth Du Beke in the ITV sitcom Benidorm (2011–2018). In addition to his work on Benidorm, he has also had starring roles as Martin in the BBC One sitcom Eyes Down (2003–2004), Graham in the ITV2 sitcom The Job Lot (2013–2014), and George Shuttleworth in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2020–present). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Liverpool
title: Tony Maudsley
